summary.para: Values that identify information about a shader variable.
summary.blockquote: [!NOTE] For programming with Direct3D 10, this API has a type alias that begins D3D10_ instead of D3D_. These Direct3D 10 type aliases are defined in d3d10.h, d3d10misc.h, and d3d10shader.h.

member.name: D3D_SHADER_VARIABLE_FLAGS.D3D_SVF_USERPACKED
member.summary: Indicates that the registers assigned to this shader variable were explicitly declared in shader code (instead of automatically assigned by the compiler).

member.name: D3D_SHADER_VARIABLE_FLAGS.D3D_SVF_USED
member.summary: Indicates that this variable is used by this shader. This value confirms that a particular shader variable (which can be common to many different shaders) is indeed used by a particular shader.

member.name: D3D_SHADER_VARIABLE_FLAGS.D3D_SVF_INTERFACE_POINTER
member.summary: Indicates that this variable is an interface.

member.name: D3D_SHADER_VARIABLE_FLAGS.D3D_SVF_INTERFACE_PARAMETER
member.summary: Indicates that this variable is a parameter of an interface.

member.name: D3D_SHADER_VARIABLE_FLAGS.D3D10_SVF_USERPACKED
member.summary: Indicates that the registers assigned to this shader variable were explicitly declared in shader code (instead of automatically assigned by the compiler).

member.name: D3D_SHADER_VARIABLE_FLAGS.D3D10_SVF_USED
member.summary: Indicates that this variable is used by this shader. This value confirms that a particular shader variable (which can be common to many different shaders) is indeed used by a particular shader.

member.name: D3D_SHADER_VARIABLE_FLAGS.D3D11_SVF_INTERFACE_POINTER
member.summary: Indicates that this variable is an interface.

member.name: D3D_SHADER_VARIABLE_FLAGS.D3D11_SVF_INTERFACE_PARAMETER
member.summary: Indicates that this variable is a parameter of an interface.

member.name: D3D_SHADER_VARIABLE_FLAGS.D3D_SVF_FORCE_DWORD
member.summary: This value is not used by a programmer; it exists to force the enumeration to compile to 32 bits.
